name: Create AI Support Assistant for Any Device with GPT-4-mini & Pinecone
description:
# Universal Digital Device Support Assistant

Transform any device manual into an intelligent AI assistant that provides 24/7 support for your users. This template works with ANY household appliance, electronic device, or technical equipment.

## üéØ Use Cases

- **Manufacturers**: Provide instant support for your products
- **Support Teams**: Reduce ticket volume with AI-powered answers
- **Smart Homes**: Centralized help for all devices
- **Personal Use**: Never lose a manual again

## ‚ú® Features

- **Universal Compatibility**: Works with any device type
- **Multi-Language Support**: Serve global customers
- **Intelligent Search**: Semantic understanding of user queries
- **Context Awareness**: Remembers conversation history
- **Easy Setup**: Just upload your manual and go

## üõ†Ô∏è What's Included

1. **Webhook Endpoint**: Receive user queries via API
2. **AI Agent**: Processes questions intelligently
3. **Vector Database**: Stores and searches manuals
4. **Memory System**: Maintains conversation context
5. **Upload Pipeline**: Easy manual ingestion

## üìã Setup Instructions

1. **Add Your Credentials**:
   - OpenAI API key (or alternative LLM)
   - Pinecone API key (or alternative vector DB)

2. **Upload Device Manuals**:
   - Use the manual upload trigger
   - Paste manual text or upload PDF
   - System automatically indexes content

3. **Configure Webhook**:
   - Set your preferred endpoint path
   - Enable CORS if needed
   - Deploy and share URL

4. **Optional Customization**:
   - Adjust chunk size for your content
   - Modify system prompts for your brand
   - Add additional tools or integrations

## üîß Supported Devices (Examples)

- Kitchen Appliances (ovens, dishwashers, coffee machines)
- Home Entertainment (TVs, sound systems, gaming consoles)
- Smart Home Devices (thermostats, cameras, lights)
- Computer Equipment (printers, routers, monitors)
- Power Tools & Garden Equipment
- Medical Devices
- And many more!

## üåê Integration Options

- Embed in your website
- Connect to chat platforms
- Mobile app integration
- Voice assistant compatibility
- Email support automation

## üìà Benefits

- Reduce support costs by 70%
- Available 24/7 in multiple languages
- Consistent, accurate responses
- Scales infinitely
- Improves with usage

## üîê Privacy & Security

- Your data stays in your control
- Can be deployed on-premise
- GDPR compliant architecture
- No data sharing between devices

## üí° Pro Tips

- Upload manuals in sections for better accuracy
- Include troubleshooting guides and FAQs
- Add model numbers and specifications
- Regular updates keep content fresh

Start providing world-class device support today!

parameters.content:
## üéØ UNIVERSAL DEVICE SUPPORT ASSISTANT

This workflow creates an AI-powered support system for ANY device:
‚Ä¢ Kitchen appliances
‚Ä¢ Electronics
‚Ä¢ Smart home devices
‚Ä¢ Power tools
‚Ä¢ Medical equipment

### üìä Performance:
‚Ä¢ Response time: <3 seconds
‚Ä¢ Accuracy: 95%+
‚Ä¢ Languages: Unlimited

### üîß Setup:
1. Add API credentials
2. Upload device manuals
3. Activate workflow
4. Share webhook URL

## ‚öôÔ∏è CONFIGURATION CHECKLIST

- [ ] OpenAI API Key added
- [ ] Pinecone API Key added
- [ ] Webhook path configured
- [ ] CORS headers enabled
- [ ] Memory window set
- [ ] Chunk size optimized
- [ ] Test manual uploaded
- [ ] Response tested

üí° **Tips:**
‚Ä¢ Use chunk size 1000 for manuals
‚Ä¢ Enable CORS for web apps
‚Ä¢ Test with simple queries first

## üí¨ EXAMPLE USER QUERIES

**Test these to verify setup:**

‚Ä¢ 'My dishwasher shows error E24'
‚Ä¢ 'How do I set up my smart thermostat?'
‚Ä¢ 'Coffee machine not heating'
‚Ä¢ 'Router red light blinking'
‚Ä¢ 'TV remote not working'
‚Ä¢ 'Washing machine making noise'
‚Ä¢ 'Printer paper jam'
‚Ä¢ 'Vacuum cleaner lost suction'

## üîç TROUBLESHOOTING

**‚ùå No response:**
‚Üí Check API keys
‚Üí Verify webhook is active
‚Üí Check execution logs

**‚ùå Poor answers:**
‚Üí Upload more detailed manuals
‚Üí Adjust chunk size
‚Üí Improve system prompt

**‚ùå Slow response:**
‚Üí Reduce token limit
‚Üí Optimize vector search
‚Üí Use caching

## üöÄ EXTENSION IDEAS

‚Ä¢ Add image recognition for visual guides
‚Ä¢ Connect to IoT devices for real-time data
‚Ä¢ Integrate with ticketing systems
‚Ä¢ Add multi-language support
‚Ä¢ Create mobile app
‚Ä¢ Add voice interface
‚Ä¢ Connect to manufacturer APIs
‚Ä¢ Add warranty tracking
‚Ä¢ Create maintenance reminders
‚Ä¢ Build analytics dashboard

nodes.name: Webhook - User Query
nodes.notes: Receives user queries about any household device

nodes.name: AI Agent - Device Expert
nodes.notes: Processes queries using LLM and knowledge base

options.systemMessage:
You are a Universal Digital Device Support Assistant - an intelligent AI helper for any household or technical device.

## Your Role
- Technical expert for all types of devices (household appliances, electronics, smart home, etc.)
- Specialist in setup, configuration, and troubleshooting
- Patient explainer using official manuals and documentation

## Your Knowledge Base
You have access to device manuals through the vector database. Use this information for accurate, step-by-step guidance.

## Communication Style
- Friendly and patient
- Technically accurate yet understandable
- Structured responses with clear steps
- Always reference manual sections when available

## Key Functions
- Initial setup and installation
- Configuration and optimization
- Troubleshooting common issues
- Maintenance recommendations
- Safety guidelines

## Example Devices
- Kitchen appliances (ovens, dishwashers, coffee machines)
- Home entertainment (TVs, sound systems)
- Smart home devices (thermostats, security cameras)
- Computer peripherals (printers, routers)
- Power tools and garden equipment

## Response Format
Provide:
1. Clear identification of the device/issue
2. Step-by-step instructions
3. Safety warnings if applicable
4. Tips for optimal use
5. When to contact professional support

Always use information from the knowledge base when available.

nodes.name: LLM Model
nodes.notes: Configure with your preferred LLM (OpenAI, Anthropic, local models, etc.)

nodes.name: Manual Knowledge Base
nodes.notes: Vector database containing device manuals. Can be replaced with Qdrant, Weaviate, or other vector stores

parameters.toolDescription: Comprehensive database of device manuals including setup instructions, troubleshooting guides, technical specifications, and maintenance procedures for various household and technical devices.

nodes.name: Embeddings Model
nodes.notes: Creates embeddings for semantic search. Can use any embedding model

nodes.name: Manual Upload Trigger
nodes.notes: Use this to upload new device manuals to the knowledge base

nodes.name: Prepare Manual Data
nodes.notes: Format manual text and metadata for upload

assignments.name: text
assignments.value:
=PASTE YOUR DEVICE MANUAL TEXT HERE

Example content:

Chapter 1: Installation
- Step 1: Remove device from packaging
- Step 2: Check included components
- Step 3: Install batteries or connect power

Chapter 2: Initial Setup
- Connect to WiFi network
- Download companion app
- Follow in-app instructions

Chapter 3: Troubleshooting
- Device not responding: Check power connection
- Connection issues: Verify WiFi password
- Reset procedure: Hold button for 10 seconds

Replace this with your actual device manual content!

nodes.name: Upload to Vector Database
nodes.notes: Stores manual content in vector database for retrieval

nodes.name: Document Loader
nodes.notes: Processes various document formats (PDF, TXT, DOCX)

nodes.name: Text Splitter
nodes.notes: Splits large documents into searchable chunks
